programme.title: Hotel strike in New York
programme.short_synopsis: New York hotel workers strike over new pay structure.
programme.medium_synopsis: New York hotel workers strike is latest row over the new two-tier pay structure.
programme.long_synopsis:
New York hotel workers strike is latest row over the new two-tier pay structure.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.
